description.p: PDF Slicer is a simple application to extract, merge, rotate and reorder pages of PDF documents. The operations can be performed on single pages or on selections/ranges of pages, and it has undo/redo support.
PDF Slicer هو تطبيق بسيط لاستخراج ، دمج ، تدوير وإعادة ترتيب صفحات مستندات PDF. العمليات يمكنها أن تطبق على الصفحات الفردية أو المتعددة ، والتطبيق يحتوي على ميزة الاعادة والاسترجاع.

PDF Slicer je jednoduchá aplikace pro extrahování, sloučení, otáčení a změnu pořadí stránek dokumentů PDF. Operace mohou být prováděny na jednotlivých stránkách nebo na výběru/rozsahu stránek s podporou zpět/znovu.

PDF Slicer ist eine einfache Anwendung zum Extrahieren, Zusammenführen, Drehen und Neuordnen von Seiten aus PDF-Dokumenten. Die Aufgaben können auf einzelnen Seiten oder auf Auswahlen/Seitenbereichen durchgeführt werden, und es gibt eine Widerrufen/Wiederholen-Funktion.

Το PDF Slicer είναι μια απλή εφαρμογή για εξαγωγή, συγχώνευση, περιστροφή και αναδιάταξη σελίδων εγγράφων PDF. Οι λειτουργίες μπορούν να εκτελεστούν σε μεμονωμένες σελίδες ή σε επιλογές/εύρος σελίδων και έχει υποστήριξη αναίρεσης/επανάληψης.

PDF Slicer es una aplicación sencilla para extraer, combinar, rotar y reordenar páginas de documentos PDF. Las operaciones pueden ser aplicadas a páginas sueltas o selecciones/rangos de páginas, con soporte para deshacer y repetir operaciones.

PDF Slicer est une application simple pour extraire, fusionner, pivoter et réorganiser les pages d'un document PDF. Les opérations peuvent être effectuées sur une seule page ou sur des sélections/ensembles de pages, et il supporte l'annulation/rétablissement des modifications.
PDF Slicer הוא כלי פשוט לחילוץ, מיזוג, הטיה וסידור מחדש של עמודים במסמכי PDF. ניתן לבצע את הפעולות על עמודים בודדים או על בחירה/טווח של עמודים לרבות תמיכה בביטול/החזרה.

PDF Slicer je jednostavan program za izdvajanje, sjedinjavanje, okretanje i mijenjanje redoslijeda stranica PDF dokumenata. Operacije se mogu izvoditi na pojedinim stranicama ili na odabranim stranicama, tj. na rasponima stranica, te postoji podrška za vraćanje/ponavljanje.

PDF Slicer è una semplice applicazione per estrarre, unire, ruotare e riordinare le pagine dei documenti PDF. Le operazioni possono essere effettuate su pagine singole o su una selezione/gruppo di pagine, e supporta l'annullamento/ripristino.
PDF Slicer は PDF ドキュメントのページを抽出、マージ、回転、および順序を変更するシンプルなアプリケーションです。単一のページ、または選択/ページの範囲で操作を実行できます。元に戻す/やり直しをサポートしています。

PDF Slicer er et enkelt program for uthenting, fletting, rotering og omstokking av sider i PDF-dokumenter. Operasjonene kan utføres på enkeltsider eller utvalg/spenn av sider, og det har full angre/gjentagelses-støtte.

PDF Slicer is een eenvoudig hulpmiddel om pagina's van pdf-documenten te extraheren, draaien, herorganiseren en samen te voegen. De handelingen kunnen worden uitgevoerd op zowel losse pagina's als selecties/reeksen van pagina's en er is ondersteuning voor ongedaan maken/opnieuw.

Slicer PDF to prosta aplikacja do wyodrębniania, scalania, obracania i zmiany kolejności stron dokumentów PDF. Operacje mogą być wykonywane na pojedynczych stronach lub na zaznaczeniach/zakresach stron i ma obsługę cofania/ponawiania.

O PDF Slicer é uma aplicação simples para extrair, mesclar, girar e reordenar páginas de documentos PDF. As operações podem ser realizadas em páginas únicas ou em seleções/intervalos de páginas, e tem suporte para desfazer/refazer.

O PDF Slicer é um aplicativo simples para extrair, mesclar, girar e reordenar páginas de documentos PDF. As operações podem ser realizadas em páginas únicas ou em seleções/intervalos de páginas, e tem suporte para desfazer/refazer.

PDF Slicer je jednoduchá aplikácia pre extrakciu, zlúčenie, otáčanie a zmenu poradia strán v dokumentoch PDF. Operácie môžu byť vykonávané na jednotlivých stranách alebo na výbere/rozsahu strán s podporou ich vrátenia späť.

PDF Slicer је једноставан програм за издвајање, спајање, ротирање и преуређивање страна PDF докумената. Операције се могу изводити на појединачним странама или на одабирима/опсегу страна и има подршку за опозивање/повратак извршених команди.

PDF Slicer, PDF belgelerinin sayfalarını ayıklamak, birleştirmek, döndürmek ve yeniden sıralamak için basit uygulamadır. İşlemler, tek tek sayfalara veya seçili sayfalara ve seçili sayfa aralıklarına uygulanabilir. Uygulamanın geri alma/yineleme özelliği vardır.
PDF Slicer 是一个简单的应用程序，可以提取、合并、旋转和重新排序 PDF 文档的页面。这些操作可以在单个页面上执行，也可以在页面选择/范围上执行，并且它具有撤消/重做支持。
This release brings:

ul.li: Windows support
A small bug fix. Sections in the Shortcuts window now reflow correctly
Updated translations

description.p: Fixes and improvements:

ul.li: Add keyboard shortcuts to move pages (@abhijeetviswa)
Use up to half of the CPU's cores for rendering pages
Don't crash when opening a file while the current one is still rendering pages

description.p: Most of the improvements in this release were made by contributors. Thanks a lot!

ul.li: Do not disable "edit" actions during document saving (@miltolstoy)
Allow opening several documents in one window (@miltolstoy)
Disable "Select odd/even pages" actions in corner cases (@miltolstoy)
Move zoom buttons to window titlebar in big previews (@miltolstoy)
Add Greek translation (@iosifidis)
Add Hebrew translation (@yarons)
Add Chinese (Simplified) translation (@taotieren)
Add Serbian translations (latin and cyrillic) (@TodorovicSrdjan)
Add Slovak translation (@jose1711)
Update existing translations
Other bug fixes and improvements

description.p: Add ability to invert the current page selection (@miltolstoy). Add Arabic translation (@3eloa). Update existing translations.
Update existing translations.
Fix a couple of bugs.

Add the ability to add multiple files in one step. Add the ability to zoom by Ctrl+Scrolling on the views. Improve keyboard navigation. Reduce the file size of some saved documents. Add Polish translation. Update existing translations.
Preserve metadata and outline of the first opened file when saving. Other improvements. Add Croatian translation. Update existing translations.
Remember the zoom level across sessions.
Add the ability to open new windows. Add more zoom levels. Other minor improvements.
Add Czech translation.
Return to the way adding files was handled before, since the new way doesn't work inside the Flatpak sandbox. Update existing translations.
Rework the way files are added to the current document. Add Hebrew and Turkish translations. Update existing translations.
Add the ability to select all pages, odd pages and even pages. Update Dutch, French, Italian, Japanese, Norwegian and Spanish translations.
Restore scroll position when zomming in/out or resizing the window. Update Dutch and Japanese translations. Miscellaneous bug fixes and UI improvements.
Fix a couple of bugs.
Add the ability to merge files. Miscellaneous UI improvements.
Fix bug where a strange directory was used when saving a file on a Flatpak-packaged Slicer.
Reduce memory consumption.
Allow selecting pages while they are still rendering. Miscellaneous bug fixes.
Replace the PDF-Writer backend library with QPDF.
Use new application icons, courtesy of Lapo Calamandrei and Tobias Bernard.
Add Italian translation.
Add Japanese translation. Update existing translations.
Add the ability to copy page annotations.
Correct a string in the About Dialog.
Add the ability to reorder pages.
Fix bug where redoing a page range removal would remove more pages than expected. Add French translation.
Fix bug where removed page ranges were re-inserted in the wrong order.
Add Portuguese translation. Update German translation.
Fix thumbnail sizing.
Fix Windows build.
Add a "page number" label to thumbnails and big previews.
Re-add the preview page function (used to get a big view of an individual page). Save and restore window state on window close and open, respectively. Add Dutch and German translations.
Prevent weird behavior when changing zoom level while there is still page rendering going on.
Implement the "selection mode" UI pattern from the Gnome HIG. Move the external AppMenu to an in-window AppMenu.
Inhibit closing a window while we are saving a document.
Replace the ConcurrentQueue library with std::queue + std::mutex.
Use a concurrent queue to prevent a data race.
The user interface no longer freezes when doing page removal operations, undoing/redoing actions, or saving a document.
Fix in-app version number.
Update application information/documentation to inform about the new rotation feature.
Add the ability to rotate pages and fix a bug where some documents where saved with weird margins.
Change saving method. This fixes the result being wrong for some PDF files and results in a smaller file size.
Fix the Windows installer. Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Show an error dialog when failing to load or save a document.
Minor other improvements.
Correct the AppStream metadata license information.
Update the AppStream metadata with missing release information for 1.0.3.
Minor bug fixes and changes:

ul.li: Changed the application id
Switched to Gtk::FileChooserNative. This has 2 benefits:
Native file dialogs are used on Windows,
It allows the application to cross the Flatpak sandbox boundary, without having permissions to read/write files on the filesystem
Improved the AppStream metadata

description.p: Changed the application icon.
This release includes many bug fixes.
The Windows installer is now considered production-ready.
Initial release.
